column5: Beautifully updated 4,000 sq.ft home in grand neighborhood of Katy, Tx. 4bed/3 bath with master downstairs, pool and 3 living/playing spaces. Easy access to i-10 freeway with a simple two-minute drive.  Perfect for the game day weekend for families or large group looking for a weekend getaway.
column8: Grand home in Katy Tx right off i-10 freeway.
